title: Blueprint, "Abby Aldrich Rockefeller Milton Apartment: Mirror Lighting", August 23, 1933
medium: Blueprint on white wove paper, double ruled border
markings: Stamp, lower right corner: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY; below: DRAWING "; JOB#/SCALE; lower left: JAMES F. De QUOY/COMPANY, INCORPORATED/SPECIAL LIGHTING EQUIPMENT/242 EAST 87TH STREET NEW YORK, N.Y.
inscribed: Inscribed in stamp, lower right: 6127/F.S./MILTON/POL. CHROME/MIRROR/ETCHED MIRROR/CRYSTAL INLAY(?); JFD&CO/D [circled], S [circled]/8/23/33; inscribed in stamp below: 338-22A/AUG. 22 - 33.; F.S.; center left: PART F.S. DETAILS OF FIXTURE/OVER BUFFET/MILTON APARTMENT/FOR DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH ST./1 REQUIRED; above: ALL POLISHED/CHROMIUM FINISH; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Full scale drawing for lighting fixture attached to mirror. Specifications indicate circular mirror to go above buffet of Rockefeller Milton apartment.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Abby Aldrich Rockefeller Milton Apartment: Mirror Lighting", August 23, 1933.
August 23, 1933. Blueprint on white wove paper, double ruled border. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-723.
